home.title: Welcome to Vic's CV
content: My CV and a showcase of my various development projects.

info.title: About Me
content: I'm Victoria Kondratska. A rookie back-end developer, who wishes to upgrade their skills on coding, conflict management and teamwork in general.
Consider myself a quick learner, eager to get new knowledge and unique experience. Have worked on various projects and consider myself moderately experienced in Python development.

items.description: Currently studying as a Software Engineer.
Shown myself as an understanding, passionate and relatable role model for older students and provided fun and leisure for younger students.

items.title: Universe Navigator
items.description: This is a web application for writers to organize their characters, terminology, and other things. Was created as a coursework.

items.title: Lit List Bot
items.description: This project organizes literature lists for different purposes: courseworks, dissertations.

items.title: Airplane Learning: Polyglot Pro
items.techStack: Python (Django), Azure (App Service, MSSQL, Blob Storage), HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JS
items.description: This is a language learning application, that has a wide variety of functions. Created as a project for a university subject.

items.title: See Ya In A Bunch
items.techStack: Python (Django, DRF), Heroku, PostGreSQL, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JS
items.description: This web application serves as a time capsule.

items.title: FECTopedia
items.description: This web application serves as a guide to studying in my university and department.

items.title: VerseVault (In Progress)
items.description: This is a publishing site for stories. Work in progress.
